document.full_text: formula one commercial supremo bernie ecclestone has dismissed reports from australia he was visiting new york this week to discuss the possibility of staging a grand prix on staten island.
document.title: ecclestone denies reports about new york grand prix
lines_and_colors: formula one commercial supremo bernie ecclestone has dismissed reports from australia he was visiting new york this week to discuss the possibility of staging a grand prix on staten island.
